dashboard.label: Users Access Review
dashboard.description: User Access Review Dashboard - Login Status, Inactivity Analysis, and Account Age

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup role | table role
index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | stats count
index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | where isnotnull(last_login) AND last_login!="" | stats count
index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | where isnull(last_login) OR last_login="" | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval never_logged=if(isnull(last_login) OR last_login="", 1, 0) | stats sum(never_logged) as never_logged, count as total | eval pct=round((never_logged/total)*100, 1)."%"

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-30d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-60d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-90d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where (isnull(last_login_time) OR last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-90d")) | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-30d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-60d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-90d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-180d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-1d") AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-30d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-30d") AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-60d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-60d") AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-90d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-90d") | stats count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval days_inactive=if(isnull(last_login_time), 9999, round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0)) | eval login_status=case( days_inactive>=9999, "Never Logged In", days_inactive>=180, "Inactive 180+ Days", days_inactive>=90, "Inactive 91-180 Days", days_inactive>=60, "Inactive 61-90 Days", days_inactive>=30, "Inactive 31-60 Days", days_inactive>=1, "Inactive 1-30 Days", 1=1, "Active Today" ) | stats count by login_status | sort -count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval days_inactive=if(isnull(last_login_time), 9999, round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0)) | eval inactivity_bucket=case( days_inactive>=9999, "Never Logged In", days_inactive>=90, "90+ Days", days_inactive>=60, "61-90 Days", days_inactive>=30, "31-60 Days", days_inactive>=1, "1-30 Days", 1=1, "Active" ) | stats count by role, inactivity_bucket

panel.title: Users Never Logged In - Account Age Analysis

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | where role LIKE "%$role_filter$%" | dedup email | where isnull(last_login) OR last_login="" | eval created_time=strptime(created, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval account_age_days=round((now()-created_time)/86400, 0) | eval account_age_months=round(account_age_days/30, 1) | eval account_age_years=round(account_age_days/365, 2) | eval age_category=case( account_age_days>=730, "2+ Years Old", account_age_days>=365, "1-2 Years Old", account_age_days>=180, "6-12 Months Old", account_age_days>=90, "3-6 Months Old", account_age_days>=30, "1-3 Months Old", 1=1, "Less than 1 Month" ) | table email, first_name, last_name, role, created, account_age_days, account_age_months, account_age_years, age_category | rename email as "Email", first_name as "First Name", last_name as "Last Name", role as "Role", created as "Created Date", account_age_days as "Age (Days)", account_age_months as "Age (Months)", account_age_years as "Age (Years)", age_category as "Age Category" | sort -"Age (Days)"

format.colorPalette: {"2+ Years Old":#DC4E41,"1-2 Years Old":#F1813F,"6-12 Months Old":#F8BE34,"3-6 Months Old":#006D9C,"1-3 Months Old":#53A051,"Less than 1 Month":#53A051}

panel.title: Never Logged Users by Account Age

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | where isnull(last_login) OR last_login="" | eval created_time=strptime(created, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval account_age_days=round((now()-created_time)/86400, 0) | eval age_category=case( account_age_days>=730, "2+ Years", account_age_days>=365, "1-2 Years", account_age_days>=180, "6-12 Months", account_age_days>=90, "3-6 Months", account_age_days>=30, "1-3 Months", 1=1, "<1 Month" ) | stats count by age_category | sort -count
index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | where isnull(last_login) OR last_login="" | stats count by role | sort -count

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | where role LIKE "%$role_filter$%" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-90d") | eval days_inactive=round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0) | eval months_inactive=round(days_inactive/30, 1) | table email, first_name, last_name, role, last_login, days_inactive, months_inactive | rename email as "Email", first_name as "First Name", last_name as "Last Name", role as "Role", last_login as "Last Login", days_inactive as "Days Inactive", months_inactive as "Months Inactive" | sort -"Days Inactive"

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | where role LIKE "%$role_filter$%" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-60d") AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-90d") | eval days_inactive=round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0) | table email, first_name, last_name, role, last_login, days_inactive | rename email as "Email", first_name as "First Name", last_name as "Last Name", role as "Role", last_login as "Last Login", days_inactive as "Days Inactive" | sort -"Days Inactive"

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | where role LIKE "%$role_filter$%" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | where isnotnull(last_login_time) AND last_login_time < relative_time(now(), "-30d") AND last_login_time >= relative_time(now(), "-60d") | eval days_inactive=round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0) | table email, first_name, last_name, role, last_login, days_inactive | rename email as "Email", first_name as "First Name", last_name as "Last Name", role as "Role", last_login as "Last Login", days_inactive as "Days Inactive" | sort -"Days Inactive"

index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval created_time=strptime(created, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval days_inactive=if(isnull(last_login_time), 9999, round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0)) | eval status_category=case( days_inactive>=9999, "Never Logged In", days_inactive>=180, "Inactive 180+ Days", days_inactive>=90, "Inactive 91-180 Days", days_inactive>=60, "Inactive 61-90 Days", days_inactive>=30, "Inactive 31-60 Days", days_inactive>=1, "Inactive 1-30 Days", 1=1, "Active Today" ) | eval review_action=case( status_category="Never Logged In" AND (now()-created_time)/86400 > 90, "Review - Remove or Activate", status_category="Inactive 180+ Days", "Review - Recommend Removal", status_category="Inactive 91-180 Days", "Review - Consider Removal", status_category="Inactive 61-90 Days", "Review - Contact User", status_category="Inactive 31-60 Days", "Monitor", 1=1, "No Action Required" ) | stats count as user_count by status_category, review_action | sort -user_count | rename status_category as "Status Category", review_action as "Recommended Action", user_count as "User Count"

format.colorPalette: {"Review - Remove or Activate":#DC4E41,"Review - Recommend Removal":#DC4E41,"Review - Consider Removal":#F1813F,"Review - Contact User":#F8BE34,"Monitor":#006D9C,"No Action Required":#53A051}

search.query: index=security_bitsight sourcetype="bitsight:users" | where role LIKE "%$role_filter$%" | dedup email | eval last_login_time=strptime(last_login, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval created_time=strptime(created, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") | eval days_inactive=if(isnull(last_login_time), 9999, round((now()-last_login_time)/86400, 0)) | eval account_age_days=round((now()-created_time)/86400, 0) | eval login_status=case( days_inactive>=9999, "Never Logged In", days_inactive>=90, "Inactive 90+ Days", days_inactive>=60, "Inactive 60-90 Days", days_inactive>=30, "Inactive 30-60 Days", 1=1, "Active" ) | eval review_required=if(days_inactive>=90 OR days_inactive>=9999, "Yes", "No") | table email, first_name, last_name, role, last_login, days_inactive, account_age_days, login_status, review_required | rename email as "Email", first_name as "First Name", last_name as "Last Name", role as "Role", last_login as "Last Login", days_inactive as "Days Inactive", account_age_days as "Account Age (Days)", login_status as "Login Status", review_required as "Review Required" | sort -"Days Inactive"
